item.description: Chapter 279 at Cranland (28M) holds a pancake breakfast the third Sunday of each month from April to October. Included is an egg, pancakes, Canadian bacon and cheese on an English muffin breakfast sandwich, coffee and orange juice. Good weather brings a great turnout of pilots and planes.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Cranland Breakfast Fly-In
